settings.heading: Our Story
settings.main_content: The SkinBiome Co.'s story began with our Founder, Dr Davide Pennino. Like many new fathers, Dr Pennino was worried about exposing his infant son to the negative effects of using topical steroids for skin disorders.
settings.img_content:
Dr Pennino spent over a decade studying the mechanisms underpinning skin disorders and the role of the skin microbiome in contributing to skin health and integrity.

He decided to use his expertise to develop a good solution for skin disorders, and The SkinBiome Co.'s solution was discovered after years of intensive research.

Our mission at The SkinBiome Co. is simple.

We aim to eradicate skin problems through the power of our skin microbiome – the natural way – starting with our first product for Eczema-prone-skin. We believe that you deserve better natural, science-driven skincare!
settings.under_content: Here at The SkinBiome Co., we only use all-natural active ingredients to tackle mild Eczema. Eliminate Your Eczema Now with Our Steroid-Free Cream!
